trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for Web proxy server usage.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Web 代理服务器用法的配置节。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to the [<defaultProxy> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaultproxy-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 此类对应于[ <defaultProxy>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaultproxy-element-network-settings.md)配置元素。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to access information about the Web proxy server used for requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于访问有关用于使用发出的请求的 Web 代理服务器信息<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和<xref:System.Net.WebClient>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the configuration elements contained in the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection> configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述中包含的配置元素<xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection>配置节。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Identifies the Web proxy server to use.
trans-unit.target: 标识要使用的 Web 代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: Identifies resources that are not retrieved using the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 标识不使用代理服务器检索的资源。

trans-unit.source: Identifies a custom <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 标识自定义<xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>实现。

trans-unit.source: This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供以编程方式访问可以在配置文件中存储的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection> settings apply only to the default proxy server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection>设置仅应用于的默认代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of resources that are not obtained using the Web proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 获取不使用 Web 代理服务器获取的资源的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElementCollection" /> that contains the addresses of resources that bypass the Web proxy server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElementCollection" />，包含跳过 Web 代理服务器的资源的地址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElementCollection> returned by this property contains one <xref:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement> for each resource that bypasses the Web Proxy server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElementCollection>返回此属性包含一个<xref:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement>每个资源的绕过 Web 代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a Web proxy is used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否使用 Web 代理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a Web proxy will be used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Web 代理，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type information for a custom Web proxy implementation.
trans-unit.target: 获取自定义 Web 代理实现的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.ModuleElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.ModuleElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The type information for a custom Web proxy implementation.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 Web 代理实现的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ModuleElement> returned by this property identifies the type, assembly, and version of a custom <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ModuleElement>返回此属性标识的类型、 程序集和的自定义版本<xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI that identifies the Web proxy server to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取标识要使用的 Web 代理服务器的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI that identifies the Web proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 标识 Web 代理服务器的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement> returned by this property identifies the Web proxy server to use for resources that are not in the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection.BypassList%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement>返回此属性标识要用于不在的资源的 Web 代理服务器<xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection.BypassList%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether default credentials are to be used to access a Web proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否使用默认凭据访问 Web 代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if default credentials are to be used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用默认凭据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
